ISSUE.TITLE: Host Add Weirdness
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY The Host Add Form has weird formatting ##### ENVIRONMENT * AWX version: 2.9 * AWX install method: docker for mac * Ansible version: 9.3 * Operating System: Mojave * Web Browser: Chrome ##### STEPS TO REPRODUCE Go to Host Add Form ##### EXPECTED RESULTS ![Screen Shot 2020-03-26 at 2 20 05 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39280967/77682197-ee192d80-6f6c-11ea-9491-81afdfa2f62a.png) ##### ACTUAL RESULTS ![Screen Shot 2020-03-26 at 2 19 15 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39280967/77682138-cfb33200-6f6c-11ea-9f90-329130cb2831.png) ##### ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

COMMIT.MESSAGE: [4.4]fixes docs link for controller versions >= 4.3 (#6446) * fixes docs link for controller versions >= 4.3 * fixes docs link for controller versions >= 4.3
